name: UFGActorRepresentationInterface
comment:
This interface makes sure this actor gets a representation that is to be shown in compass and
in the minimap and similar things.

methods.name: AddAsRepresentation
methods.comment: Adds the actor to the actor representation manager

methods.name: UpdateRepresentation
methods.comment: Updates the actor in the actor representation manager

methods.name: RemoveAsRepresentation
methods.comment: Should be called when an actor is destroyed. Then we should remove this representation.

methods.name: IsActorStatic
methods.comment: Tells us if the actor is static or not.

methods.name: GetRealActorLocation
methods.comment: Called on the server to get the location of this actor so it can be replicated to clients.

methods.name: GetRealActorRotation
methods.comment: Called on the server to get the rotation of this actor so it can be replicated to clients.

methods.name: GetActorRepresentationTexture
methods.comment: Fetches the texture to use for this actors representation

methods.name: GetActorRepresentationText
methods.comment: Fetches the text to use for this actors representation

methods.name: SetActorRepresentationText
methods.comment: Set the text to use for this actors representation

methods.name: GetActorRepresentationColor
methods.comment: Fetches the color to use for this actors representation

methods.name: SetActorRepresentationColor
methods.comment: Set the color to use for this actors representation

methods.name: GetActorRepresentationType
methods.comment: Fetches the representation type to use for this actor

methods.name: GetActorShouldShowInCompass
methods.comment: Should this actor ever be shown in the compass

methods.name: GetActorShouldShowOnMap
methods.comment: Should this actor ever be shown on the map
